    • Method Detail

      • isAutoSavePattern

        public static boolean isAutoSavePattern(Context context)
        Checks if the library is using auto-save pattern mode.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        Returns:
        true or false. Default is false.

      • setAutoSavePattern

        public static void setAutoSavePattern(Context context,
                      boolean v)
        Sets auto-save pattern mode.

        You can set this value in AndroidManifest.xml with METADATA_AUTO_SAVE_PATTERN.

        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        v - the auto-save mode.

      • getPattern

        public static char[] getPattern(Context context)
        Gets the pattern.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        Returns:
        the pattern. Default is null.

              char[] pattern)
        Sets the pattern.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        pattern - the pattern, can be null to reset it.

      • getEncrypterClass

        public static char[] getEncrypterClass(Context context)
        Gets encrypter class.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        Returns:
        the full name of encrypter class. Default is null.

      • setEncrypterClass

        public static void setEncrypterClass(Context context,
                     Class<?> clazz)
        Sets encrypter class.

        You can set this value in AndroidManifest.xml with METADATA_ENCRYPTER_CLASS.

        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        clazz - the encrypter class, can be null if you don't want to use it.

      • setEncrypterClass

        public static void setEncrypterClass(Context context,
                     char[] clazz)
        Sets encrypter class.

        You can set this value in AndroidManifest.xml with METADATA_ENCRYPTER_CLASS.

        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        clazz - the full name of encrypter class, can be null if you don't want to use it.
